titleStmt.title: The delights of Holland: or, A three months travel about that and the other provinces With observations and reflections on their trade, wealth, strength, beauty, policy, &c. together with a catalogue of the rarities in the anatomical school at Leyden. By William Mountague, Esq;

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Sturton, near Serjeant's-Inn Gate, in Chancery -Lane; and A. Bosvile, at the Dial over-against St. Dunstan's Church, in Fleet-street,
